articles.title: Indiana throttles Oregon, one win from first title - ESPN
articles.description: Undefeated Indiana's already impressive march through the College Football Playoff continued Friday with a 56-22 win over Oregon in the Peach Bowl semifinal.
articles.content: ATLANTA -- Undefeated Indiana's already impressive march through the College Football Playoff gained momentum as its dominant defense created three first-half touchdowns with turnovers, Fernando Mend… [+3427 chars]
